src: ते म्हणाले, “आमच्याकडे आता 4 महिन्यांचा उंदीर आहे ज्याला मधुमेह नाही ज्याला मधुमेही होण्यासाठी वापरले जाईल.
mt: 4 months old baby who has no diabetes will be used to make diabetic.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: डॉ. एहूद उर, हॉलिफॅक्समधील डलहौसी युनिव्हर्सिटी ऑफ मेडिसिनचे प्रोफेसर नोव्हा स्कॉशिया आणि कॅनेडियन डायबेटिस असोसिएशनच्या क्लिनिकल आणि वैज्ञानिक विभागाचे अध्यक्ष यांनी सांगितले की संशोधन हे अद्याप सुरुवातीच्या काळातील स्थितीत आहे.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Clinical and Scientific Division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, said the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: इतर काही तज्ञांप्रमाणेच , मधुमेह बरा होतो की नाही याविषयी तो साशंक आहे, या शोधाचा आधीच प्रकार १ मधुमेह असणाऱ्या लोकांशी काही संबध नाही.
mt: He is skeptical that the study's findings will help people with type 1 diabetes, as the study did not involve people with that condition.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: सोमवारी, सारा डॅनिअस, स्विडिश अकादमी येथील साहित्याच्या नोबेल कमिटीच्या कायमस्वरूपी सचिव यांनी स्विडनमधील स्वेरीज (स्विडिश) रेडिओवरील कार्यक्रमादरम्यान सार्वजनिकरीत्या घोषणा केली की, कमिटीने बॉब डायलन यांच्याशी २०१६ सालचे साहित्यातील नोबेल पारितोषिक मिळाल्याबद्दल थेट संपर्क साधू न शकल्यामुळे, त्यांच्यापर्यंत पोहोचण्याचा प्रयत्न सोडून दिला.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the Swedish Academy's permanent secretary, announced publicly on Swedish Radio's program that the committee had been unable to directly contact Bob Dylan, who had won the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, and had given up trying to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: "डॅनीयस म्हणाले, ""आत्ता सध्या आम्ही काहीही करत नाही. मी त्याच्या सर्वात जवळच्या समन्वयकास फोन केला आणि मेल पाठवले अतिशय मैत्रीपूर्ण उत्तर मिळाले. आत्तासाठी तरी ते नक्की पुरेसे आहे."""
mt: "Dennis said, "Right now we're doing nothing. I called the closest coordinator and sent a mail and got a very friendly response. For now, that's enough.""
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: याआधी, रिंगचे सीईओ, जेमी सिमीनऑफ ने असे उद्गार काढले की ही कंपनी तेव्हा सुरु झाली जेव्हा त्याच्या दाराची घंटा त्याच्या गॅरेजमधील दुकानातून ऐकू येत नव्हती.
mt: Previously, Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company was started when the doorbell's chime was not audible from his garage to his store.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: ते म्हणाले की, त्यांनी WiFi डोअर बेल बनवली आहे.
mt: They say they have built a WiFi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: सिमीनऑफ म्हणाले  कि 2013 मध्ये एका शार्क टॅंक  भागामध्ये  त्यांच्या उपस्थितीनंतर जिथे कार्यक्रमाच्या पॅनल त्यांच्या स्टार्टअपला निधी देण्याचे नाकारले होते त्यानंतर विक्री भरपूर वाढली.
mt: In 2013, after appearing on Shark Tank, where the panel rejected their startup's funding, Siminoff said sales skyrocketed.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017 च्या उत्तरार्धात, शॉपिंग टेलिव्हिजन चॅनेल QVC वर सिमिनॉफ दिसले होते.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping television channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: रिंगने प्रतिस्पर्धी सुरक्षा कंपनी, एडीटी कॉर्पोरेशनसोबत खटल्याचा निकाल लावला.
mt: Ring filed a lawsuit against rival security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: जरी एक प्रायोगिक लस इबोलाचा मृत्युदर कमी करू शकली असली तरी, आतापर्यंत कोणतेही औषध आधीच झालेल्या संसर्गाला योग्यरित्या लागू पडलेले नाही.
mt: While a trial vaccine has been shown to reduce mortality from Ebola, no drug has yet been shown to be effective against an already existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: ZMapp या नावाच्या 1 का अँटीबॉडी कॉकटेलने प्रारंभी क्षेत्रात आश्वासन दिले, परंतु औपचारिक अभ्यासानुसार हे मृत्यूपासून बचाव करण्यापेक्षा कमी फायदेशीर असल्याचे निदर्शनास आले.
mt: 1st in the area, ZMapp, a cocktail of antibodies, had given hope, but formal studies showed it was less effective than saving lives.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM चाचणीमध्ये, ZMapp ने नियंत्रण म्हणून कार्य केले, याचा अर्थ शास्त्रज्ञांनी याचा उपयोग बेसलाइन म्हणून केला आणि त्यासह इतर 3 ट्रीटमेंट्सची तुलना केली.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp performed as a control, meaning that scientists used it as a baseline and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: युएसए जिम्नॅस्टिक्सने युनायटेड स्टेट ऑलिम्पिक कमिटीच्या पत्राला पाठिंबा दर्शवला आहे आणि आपल्या सर्व अॅथलेटसाठी सुरक्षित वातावरणाचा प्रचार करण्याची ऑलिम्पिक कुटुंबाची आवश्यकता मान्य केली आहे.
mt: The United States Gymnastics has shown support for the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and acknowledged the need for the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: आमच्या अ‍ॅथलेट्स आणि क्लबचे हितसंबंध असलेल्या  USOC च्या विधानासह आम्ही सहमत आहोत आणि आणि त्याऐवजी निर्धारण करण्यापेक्षा, आमच्या संस्थेमध्ये अर्थपूर्ण बदलासह पुढे जाऊन त्यांचा खेळ, उत्तम प्रकारे खेळला जाऊ शकतो.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement and instead of making determinations, we are moving forward with meaningful changes to our organization to ensure our athletes and club can play the game at its best.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA जिम्नॅस्टिक्स स्वतंत्र तपासणीचे समर्थन करते ज्यामुळे लॅरी नासरच्या वाचलेल्या लोकांद्वारे इतक्या धैर्याने वर्णन केलेल्या प्रमाणात गैरवर्तन इतक्या काळापर्यंत कसे केले जाऊ शकते तसेच आवश्यक आणि योग्य बदल स्वीकारले असते यावर प्रकाश टाकू शकते.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports independent investigation that could reveal how much misconduct was allowed to go on for so long, as well as necessary and appropriate changes that could be made.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA जिम्नॅस्टिक्स आणि USOC यांचे लक्ष्य समान आहे - जिम्नॅस्टिक्स आणि इतर खेळांना खेळाडूंकरिता सुरक्षित, सकारात्मक आणि सशक्त वातावरणात त्यांच्या स्वप्नांना पूर्ण करणे शक्य तितके सुरक्षित बनविणे.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC share the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports safe, positive and empowering environments for athletes to achieve their dreams as safely as possible.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: संपूर्ण १९६० मध्ये, ब्रझेझिन्स्की यांनी जॉन एफ. केनेडी यांचे सल्लागार म्हणून आणि त्यानंतर लायडन बी. जॉनसन यांच्या प्रशासनात काम केले.
mt: 1960, Brezhinsky served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: १९७६ च्या निवडण्याच्या प्रक्रियेदरम्यान त्यांनी परकीय धोरणाविषयी कार्टर यांना सल्ला दिला, त्यानंतर राष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा सल्लागार (NSA) म्हणून त्यांनी हेन्री किसिंगर यांच्यानंतर १९७७ ते १९८१ या कालावधीत सेवा दिली.
mt: 1976 election process, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981 after Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSA म्हणून त्यांनी जागतिक बाबींना मुत्सद्दीपणाने हाताळण्यास कार्टर यांना मदत केली जसे की कॅम्प डेव्हिड अ‍ॅकार्ड्स,1978; 1970 दशकाच्या उत्तरार्धात अमेरिका-चीन संबंधांना सामान्य करण्याच्या विचारात; इराण क्रांती, ज्यामुळे इराण बंधक संकट ओढावले1979; आणि 1979 मध्ये अफगाणिस्तानात सोव्हिएत आक्रमण.
mt: NSA helped Carter deal with world affairs as he saw fit, such as Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s; Iranian Revolution, which led to Iranian hostage crisis of 1979; and the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: रायन गॉस्लिंग आणि एमा स्टोन यांच्या चित्रपटाला, सर्व प्रमुख विभागात नामांकन प्राप्त झाले.
mt: Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone's film received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: गोस्लिंग आणि स्टोन यांना अनुक्रमे सर्वोत्तम नट आणि नटी यासाठी नामनिर्देशन मिळाले.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: इतर नामांकनामध्ये उत्कृष्ट चित्रपट, दिग्दर्शक, चित्रांकन, वेशभूषा, संपादन, मूळ संगीत, निर्मिती रचना, ध्वनी संकलन, ध्वनी मिश्रण आणि मूळ पटकथा यांचा समावेश होतो.
mt: Other nominations included Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: ऑडिशन (द फूल्स  हू ड्रीम ) आणि सिटी ऑफ स्टार्स या चित्रपटातील 2 सर्वोत्तम ओरिजिनल गाणी म्हणून नामनिर्देशन प्रप्त झाले. लायन्सगेट स्टुडीओ ने इतर कोणाही स्टुडीओपेक्षा अधिक 26 नामांकने  प्राप्त केली.
mt: 2 songs from the movie "The Faults in Our Stars" and "City of Stars" from the movie "La La Land" received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate Studio received more nominations than any other studio with 26 nominations.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: रविवारी उशिरा संयुक्त राष्ट्रसंघाचे अध्यक्ष डोनाल्ड ट्रम्प यांनी, प्रेस सुरक्षेच्या मार्फत दिलेल्या विधानात यूएस सैनिक सीरिया सोडत असल्याची घोषणा केली.
mt: On Sunday, United Nations Secretary General Donald Trump announced that U.S. troops would be withdrawn from Syria, in a statement made through the press.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: ट्रंप यांनी तुर्कीश अध्यक्ष रेसेप तय्यिप एर्दोगान यांच्याशी फोनवर संभाषण केल्यानंतर ही घोषणा करण्यात आली.
mt: This announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: तुर्की पकडलेल्या ISIS सैनिकांचे रक्षण देखील हाती घेईल जे, त्या निवेदनानुसार, युरोपिय राष्ट्रांनी परत घेण्यास नकार दिला आहे.
mt: Turkey will also protect ISIS fighters captured by it, as, according to the statement, European countries have refused to take them back.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: हे केवळ पुष्टीकरणच करत नाही की किमान काही डायनासोरना पंख होतेच, एक सिद्धांत आधीपासून व्यापक आहे, परंतु सामान्यत: रंग आणि 3-मितीय व्यवस्था यासारख्या जीवाश्मांद्वारे आपल्याला शक्य नाही अशा तपशीलांची माहिती दिली जाते.
mt: This does not necessarily confirm that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a widely accepted theory, but provides information on details such as color and 3-dimensional structure that would not be possible from fossils.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . शास्त्रज्ञ म्हणतात की या प्राण्याचा पिसारा वर चेस्टनटसारखा तपकिरी रंगाचा आणि आतील बाजूस फिकट गजरी रंगाचा आहे.
mt: The scientists say that the bird's feathers are chestnut-colored on the outside and a lighter orange on the inside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: शोध पक्षाच्या पिसांच्या उत्क्रांतीबाबतही माहिती देतो.
mt: It also provides information about the evolution of the bird's feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: डायनोसॉरच्या पिसामध्ये विकसित असा आरा नावाचा दांडा नसतो परंतु त्यांच्या मध्ये पिसांची इतर वैशिष्ट्ये असतात - कंट आणि कंटरोमक - शास्त्रज्ञानी असे अनुमान काढले आहे की आरा बहुधा इतर वैशिष्ट्यापेक्षा  अनुवंश विकासामध्ये पुढील टप्प्यातील विकास असण्याची शक्यता आहे.
mt: Dinosaurs did not have feathers in their arms, but they did have other features of the wing, the keel and the coracoid, scientists have concluded that the keel is probably the next step in the development of the development of the development of the development of the development of the development
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: पिसांची रचना ती संघर्षासाठी वापरण्यात आलेली नसून तापमान नियंत्रित करण्यासाठी किंवा दाखवण्यासाठी वापरली असल्याचे दर्शवते. अभ्यासक असे सुचवतात की, जरी ही लहान डायनासोरची शेपटी असली तरी नमुना हा प्रौढ पिसारा असल्याचे दर्शवत असून तो पिल्लाचा नाही.
mt: The structure of the feathers is not for fighting, but for temperature control or display. Researchers suggest that, although this small dinosaur's tail is like a feathered adult, it is not a juvenile.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: अभ्यासकांनी असा सल्ला दिला की, जरी ही लहान डायनासोरची शेपटी असली तरी नमुना हा प्रौढ पिसारा असल्याचे दर्शवत असून तो पिल्लाचा नाही.
mt: Researchers have suggested that, although this small dinosaur's tail is similar to that of a bird, the specimen is an adult, not a juvenile.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: काल सकाळी गाझियनटेप, टर्की येथे पोलीस मुख्यालयामध्ये झालेल्या कार बॉम्बस्फोटात २ पोलीस अधिकारी मारले गेले आणि इतर वीस लोक जखमी झाले.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and 25 injured in a car bomb explosion at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey this morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: राज्यपाल कार्यालयाकडून सांगण्यात आले की जखमींपैकी एकोणीस जण पोलिस अधिकारी होते.
mt: 31 of the injured were police officers, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: पोलिस म्हणाले की त्यांचा संशय हा हल्ल्याची जबाबदारी घेणाऱ्या संशयित दाईश (आयसिस) वर आहे.
mt: Police say their suspicion is on the Islamic State (ISIS) for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: त्यांना आढळून आले की सूर्य देखील इतर तार्‍याप्रमाणे  त्याच मुलभूत तत्त्वावर कार्य करतो. प्रणालीतील ताऱ्यांची क्रियाशीलता त्यांच्या अनुदिप्ती, त्यांचे परिवलन  यावर अवलंबून असते आणि इतर कशावरही नाही.
mt: They found that the sun also works on the same basic principles as other stars. The activity of the stars in the system depends on their mass, their rotation and their evolution, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: ताऱ्याचा रॉसबी क्रमांक निश्चित करण्यासाठी तेजोमयता आणि परिभ्रमण एकत्र वापरले जाते, जे प्लाझ्मा प्रवाहाशी संबंधित असते.
mt: To determine the Rossby number, the vorticity and rotation are combined, which are related to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: रॉस्बी संख्या जितकी लहान असेल तितकाच तो तारा चुंबकीय परावर्तनाच्या बाबतीत कमी सक्रिय असेल.
mt: The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is magnetically.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: इवासाकी त्यांच्या सहली दरम्यान अनेकदा अडचणीत सापडले.
mt: Iwasaki often found himself in trouble during his travels.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: त्याला दरोडेखोरांनी लुटले, तिबेटमध्ये त्याच्यावर वेड्या कुत्राने हल्ला केला, नेपाळमधील लग्नातून तो पळाला आणि त्याला भारतात अटक झाली.
mt: He was robbed by bandits, attacked by a mad dog in Tibet, ran away from a wedding in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11 एन मानक 2.4Ghz आणि 5.0Ghz वारंवारता दोन्हीवर कार्यरत आहे.
mt: 802.11n standard operates on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: यामुळे 802.11 a, 802.11 b आणि 802.11 g सोबत तुल्यक्षम होण्यास त्याला मागे जाता येईल, तथापि बेस स्टेशनमध्ये दुहेरी रेडियोज आहेत.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g can coexist with it, but the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11 n चे वेग त्याच्या पूर्वाधिकाऱ्यांपेक्षा खूप अधिक वेगाने आहेत आणि अधिकतम सैद्धांतिक निष्कर्ष 600 Mbit/s चा असतो.
mt: 802.11n's speeds are much faster than its predecessors and the maximum theoretical result is 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: डुवाल, ज्याचे लग्न होऊन त्याला दोन मुले आहेत त्याने ज्याच्याशी ही गोष्ट संबंधित आहे अशा मिलरवर काही मोठा प्रभाव पाडला नाही.
mt: Duval, who has two children with his wife, did not appear to have much influence over Miller, who was involved in the same thing.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: "टिप्पणी देण्यास सांगितले असता, मिलर म्हणाले, ""माइक सुनावणीच्या वेळी अनेक गोष्टी बोलतो ... मी तयार होत असल्यामुळे तो खरोखर काय बोलत होता हे मी ऐकत नव्हतो."""
mt: "When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike was talking about a lot of things during the interview... I was getting ready so I wasn't really listening to what he was saying.""
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: """आम्ही २००५ मधील पातळीपेक्षा २०२० च्या कार्बन डायऑक्साइडच्या GDP च्या प्रति युनिट उत्सर्जनात मोठ्या प्रमाणात घट आणण्याचा प्रयत्न करत आहोत,"" असे हु म्हणाले. "
mt: "We are trying to bring down the carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP significantly from the level of 2005," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: चीनच्या आर्थिक आउटपुटवर आधारित ते ठरवले जाईल असे म्हणून त्यांनी कटसाठी कोणतीही संख्या ठरवली नाही.
mt: They did not specify any number for the cut, saying it would be based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: "हू यांनी विकसनशील देशांना ""आधी प्रदूषण करणे आणि त्यानंतर साफ करण्याचा जुना मार्ग टाळण्यासाठी"" प्रोत्साहित केले."
mt: "He encouraged developing countries to avoid the old path of 'first pollute and then clean up'."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: "ते पुढे म्हणाले की ""त्यांची विकास अवस्था, जबाबदारी आणि क्षमतांहून अधिक उत्तरदायित्वे घेण्यास, मात्र, त्यांना विचारले जाऊ नये."""
mt: "They said that their development stage, responsibilities and capabilities were more than their duties, but they were not asked."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: इराक स्टडी ग्रुप ने आज १२.०० GMT वाजता त्यांचा अहवाल सादर केला.
mt: 12.00 GMT the Iraq Study Group will release its report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: हा इशारा देत आहे की इराकमध्ये या टप्प्यावर होणार्‍या कोणत्याही कृतीमुळे सांप्रदायिक युद्ध, वाढता हिंसाचार किंवा अनागोंदीकडील दिशेने जाणारा त्रास थांबेल याची हमी कोणीही 1 हमी देऊ शकत नाही.
mt: This is a reminder that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this stage will prevent sectarian war, further violence or a slide towards chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: या अहवालात आरंभी मुक्त चर्चेची आणि मध्य पूर्वेच्या बाबतीत धोरणावर अमेरिकेत मतैक्य निर्मिती विनंती करण्यात आली आहे.
mt: The statement initially calls for free and open dialogue and a unified approach on Middle East policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: या अहवालात इराकच्या बाबतीत एक्झिक्युटीवच्या वर्तमान धोरणाच्या जवळपास प्रत्येक पैलूवर प्रखर टीका करण्यात आली आहे आणि दिशा तत्काळ बदलण्याचं आवाहन केलं आहे.
mt: This report criticizes almost every aspect of the current policy of the Executive on Iraq and calls for a change of direction immediately.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: त्याच्या 78 शिफारशींपैकी प्रथम म्हणजे विरोधी हस्तक्षेपांविरूद्ध इराकच्या सीमा सुरक्षित करण्यासाठी आणि त्याच्या शेजारील राष्ट्रांसोबत राजनैतिक संबंध पुन्हा स्थापित करण्यासाठी या वर्षाच्या अखेरीस एक नवीन परराष्ट्रसंबंधाविषयक कुशलतापूर्वक पुढाकार घ्यावा.
mt: 78 of his recommendations were to oppose interference from Iraq's neighbors and to restore political relations with its neighboring countries by the end of this year.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: सध्याच्या सेनेटर आणि अर्जंटिनाच्या पहिल्या महिला क्रिस्टिना फर्नांडिज डी कर्चनर यांनी काल संध्याकाळी ब्युनोस आयर्सपासून ५० किलोमीटर (३१ मैल) अंतरावर असलेल्या ला प्लाटा या शहरात राष्ट्राध्यक्षपदाची उमेदवारी जाहीर केली.
mt: 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, current senator and first female president of Argentina Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for the presidency of the country in the evening of the same day in the city of La Plata.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: सौ. किर्चनर यांनी अर्जेंटाईन नाट्यगृह येथे आपल्या अध्यक्षपदाची निवडणूक लढविण्याचा हेतू घोषित केला, हेच ठिकाण त्यांनी ब्यूनोस एअर्स प्रभाग प्रतिनिधी मंडळाचे एक सदस्य म्हणून 2005 साली सिनेट साठी मोहीम सुरु करण्याकरिता वापरले होते.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her candidacy for the presidency of the Argentine National Theatre, the same place she used in 2005 to launch her Senate campaign as a Buenos Aires district delegate.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "कॅटरीना चक्रीवादळाच्या पार्श्वभूमीवर मदत आणि पुनर्रचनेसाठी खर्च केल्याच्या वादामुळे या चर्चेला सुरुवात झाली; काही आर्थिक पुरातनमतवादींनी यास ""बुश यांचा न्यू ऑर्लीयन्स करार"" असे विनोदी नाव दिले आहे."
mt: "The debate began in the context of the controversy over the cost of aid and reconstruction in the wake of Hurricane Katrina; some economic paleoconservatives have dubbed it the "Bush administration's New Orleans deal" in a humorous reference."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: पुनर्निर्माण प्रयत्नांच्या उदार टीकेने वॉशिंग्टनच्या आतील व्यक्तींना पुनर्निर्माण कराराचे बक्षिस देण्यावर लक्ष केंद्रित केले आहे.
mt: The generous criticism of the reconstruction efforts has focused Washington's attention on the reconstruction contract's bonuses.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: चाळीस लाखांहून अधिक लोक अंत्यसंस्कारात सामील होण्यासाठी रोम येथे गेले.
mt: 40,000 people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: उपस्थित असणारे लोक इतके अधिक होते की प्रत्येक सेंट. पीटर चौकात अंत्यविधीसाठी जागा मिळणे शक्य नव्हते.
mt: So many people were present that it was impossible to find a place at St. Peter's Square for the funeral.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: हा सोहळा लोकांना पाहता यावा यासाठी रोममध्ये अनेक ठिकाणी कित्येक मोठे टेलिव्हिजन पडदे बसवण्यात आले होते.
mt: The event was made visible to the public by erecting many large television screens in many places in Rome.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: इटलीच्या इतर शहरांमध्ये आणि जगात इतरत्र, विशेषतः पोलंडमध्ये, अशीच व्यवस्था करण्यात आली होती जी अनेक लोकांनी पाहिली.
mt: Similar arrangements were made in other Italian cities and elsewhere in the world, especially in Poland, which many people saw.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: इतिहासकारांनी एजन्सीच्या यशाचा दर वाढविण्याच्या हेतूने, विशेषत: चोरी गेलेल्या कारच्या घटनांसारख्या निराकरण करण्यास सोप्या प्रकरणांवर संसाधनांना केंद्रित करण्यासाठी पूर्वीच्या FBI धोरणांवर टीका केली आहे.
mt: Historians have criticized the agency's focus on easy cases, especially car thefts, to boost its clearance rate, as part of a previous FBI policy of concentrating resources on solving old crimes.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: काँग्रेसने वित्तीय वर्ष 2005 मध्ये अश्लिलता पुढाकाराला निधी पुरवठा सुरु केला आणि निश्चित केले की एफबीआयने प्रौढ पोर्नोग्राफीसाठी खास 10 एजंट्स नियुक्त केले पाहिजेत.
mt: 2005, the Congress began to fund the Ashlita initiative and decided that the FBI should appoint 10 agents specifically for adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: रॉबिन उथप्पा यांनी फक्त ४१ चेंडूंमध्ये ११ चौकार आणि २ षटकार मरून ७० रन केले आणि इनिंगमधील सर्वात उच्च स्कोअर केला.
mt: 41 balls, 11 fours and 2 sixes, Robin Uthappa scored 70 runs and the highest score in the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: सचिन तेंडूलकर आणि राहुल द्रविड या मधल्या फळीतील फलंदाजांनी खूप चांगली कामगिरी केली आणि शंभर धावांची भागीदारी केली आहे.
mt: Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid have done well in the middle order and have a 100-run partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: परंतु, कर्णधाराची विकेट गमावल्यानंतर भारताने डाव समाप्त करण्यासाठी केवळ 7 विकेट गमावत 36 धावा केल्या.
mt: However, after losing the captain's wicket, India could only score 36 runs off 7 wickets.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: अमेरिकेचे राष्ट्राध्यक्ष जॉर्ज डब्ल्यू. बुश 16 नोव्हेंबर रोजी सकाळी आठवड्याभराच्या आशिया दौर्‍यास सुरुवात करण्यासाठी सिंगापूर येथे दाखल झाले.
mt: 16 November 2006, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore to begin a week-long Asian tour.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: सिंगापूरच्या उपपंतप्रधान वोंग कान सेंग यांनी त्यांचे स्वागत केले तसेच त्यांनी सिंगापूरच्या पंतप्रधान ली हिसियन लूंग यांच्याशी व्यापार आणि दहशतवादाच्या मुद्द्यांवर चर्चा केली.
mt: Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister WONG Kan Seng welcomed the visit and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: मध्यावधी निवडणुकांमध्ये आठवडाभर तोटा झाल्यानंतर, बुश यांनी प्रेक्षकांना आशियातील व्यापाराच्या विस्ताराबद्दल सांगितले.
mt: After losing ground in the midweek polls, Bush spoke to the audience about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: पंतप्रधान स्टीफन हार्पर यांनी PMO येथे NDP नेते जॅक लेटन यांच्याशी मंगळवारी झालेल्या 25 मिनिटांच्या बैठकीनंतर, सरकारचा 'शुद्ध हवा अधिनियम' सर्वपक्षीय समितीकडे पुनरावलोकनासाठी पाठवण्याची सहमती दर्शवली आहे.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper indicated to NDP Leader Jack Layton in a 25-minute meeting at the PMO on Monday that the government's "clean air act" would be sent back to all-party committee for review.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: "लेटन यांनी पंतप्रधान यांच्यासोबत सभेमध्ये पुराणमतवादी यांच्या पर्यावरण कायद्यामध्ये अनेक बदल सुचवले आहेत,  पुराणमतवादी पक्षाचा पर्यावरण कायदा प्रारूप याचे  "" तपशीलवार आणि पूर्णत: पुनर्लेखन"" व्हावे अशी मागणी केली आहे.   "
mt: "Letn has suggested to the Prime Minister in the meeting that the environmental law of the Puranmatvadi party should be changed in many ways, the Puranmatvadi party's environmental law draft should be "" detailed and fully rewritten ""."
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: डेव्हनपोर्ट, टास्मानिया येथील मर्सी रुग्णालयाlला निधी पुरवण्याचे काम आपल्याकडे घेण्याचे फेडरल सरकारने ठरवल्यापासून, राज्य सरकार आणि काही फेडरल खासदारांनी नोव्हेंबरमध्ये होणाऱ्या फेडरल निवडणुकीसाठी ही कृती एका मोठ्या स्टंटची सुरुवात असल्याची टीका केली आहे.
mt: Since the Federal Government decided to take over funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised the move as a big stunt ahead of the November federal election.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: परंतु पंतप्रधान जॉन हॉवर्ड हे म्हणाले आहेत की हा कायदा केवळ टास्मानिय सरकारकडून या दवाखान्याच्या सोयी सुविधा कमी प्रतीच्या करू नयेत याची सुरक्षा करण्यासाठी आहे, अतिरिक्त AUD$45 मिलियन देऊन.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the law was only to ensure that the Tasmanian government did not reduce the facilities of this hospital to a low tax rate, an additional AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: ताज्या बुलेटीन नुसार, समुद्र पातळी वाचने हे दर्शवतात की त्सुनामी तयार झाली होती, पागो पागो आणि नियू या ठिकाणी अगदी निश्चित अशी त्सुनामी क्रियाशीलतेची नोंद झाली.
mt: Latest bulletins show that the tsunami was already forming, with Pago Pago and Niué reporting definite tsunami activity.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: टोंगामध्ये कोणतेही मोठे नुकसान किंवा जखम झाल्याची नोंद केली गेली नाही, परंतु वीज तात्पुरती खंडीत केली गेली, ज्यामुळे PTWC ने दिलेल्या त्सुनामीचा इशारा मिळाल्यापासून टोंगानच्या अधिकार्‍यांना प्रतिबंधित केले होते.
mt: No major damage or injuries were reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily interrupted, which prompted officials in Tonga to restrict access after the tsunami warning was issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: हवाईच्या समुद्र किनारी किंवा जवळ असलेल्या चौदा शाळेत इशारा मागे घेण्यात आला तरीही बुधवारी बंद होत्या.
mt: 14 schools near the coast or close to the sea were closed on Wednesday, despite the warning being withdrawn.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: अमेरिकेचे राष्ट्राध्यक्ष जॉर्ज डब्ल्यू. बुश यांनी घोषणेचे स्वागत केले.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: "बुश यांचे प्रवक्ते गॉर्डन जॉनड्रो यांनी उत्तर कोरियाच्या प्रतिज्ञेस ""कोरियन द्वीपकल्पातील पडताळण्याजोगे डीन्यूक्लिअरायझेशन साध्य करण्याच्या उद्दिष्ट्याच्या दिशेने एक मोठे पाऊल असल्याचे म्हटले आहे."""
mt: "Bush administration officials said the North Korean declaration was a "big step" toward the goal of making the Korean peninsula free of nuclear weapons."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: सबट्रॉपिकल स्टॉर्म जेरी हे नाव असलेले अटलांटिक चक्रीवादळ हंगामाचे दहावे वादळ, आज अटलांटिक महासागरात निर्माण झाले आहे.
mt: Subtropical storm Jerry is the tenth named storm of the 2019 Atlantic hurricane season, which formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: नॅशनल हरिकेन सेंटर (NHC) चे असे म्हणणे आहे की, या क्षणी जेरीचा जमिनीला कोणत्याही प्रकारचा धोका नाही.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says there is no threat to land at this time.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: U.S. कॉर्प्स ऑफ इंजिनिअर्सचा अंदाज आहे की 6 इंचचा पाऊस पूर्वी नुकसान झालेल्या लेव्हिसचे उल्लंघन करू शकतो.
mt: 6 inches of rain could breach the levees that were damaged by the flood.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: चक्रीवादळ कतरिना दरम्यान 20 फूटांपर्यंत उंचावलेला नववा प्रभाग, जवळपासचे लेव्ही ओव्हर टॉप केल्यामुळे सध्या कंबरेपेक्षा जास्त पाण्यात आहे.
mt: 20 feet above the ninth district, the nearby levee overtopped due to the Katrina storm surge, currently higher than the waist.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: 100 फुट रुंद बंधाऱ्याच्या एका भागातून पाणी ओसंडून वाहत आहे.
mt: 100 foot wide levee is breached and water is flowing through.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: कॉमन्स अॅड्मिनिस्ट्रेटर अॅडम कुर्डन यांनी मागील महिन्यात विकिन्यूजसोबत संवाद साधला तेव्हा त्यांनी डीलेशनबद्दल त्यांची निराशा व्यक्त केली.
mt: Commons Administrator Adam Wight had previously spoken with Wikinews in the previous month, expressing his disappointment with the deal.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: """तो [वेल्स] मुळात आमच्याशी सुरुवातीपासूनच खोटे बोलला. प्रथम, हे कायदेशीर कारणांसाठी होते, असा अभिनय करून. दुसरे म्हणजे, त्याची कला हटविण्यापासून, तो आमचे ऐकत असल्याचे भासवून."""
mt: "He [Wales] was lying to us from the beginning. First, it was for legal reasons, pretending to listen to us. Second, he was trying to take away our art, pretending to listen to us."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: सामुदायिक चिडचिडीमुळे लाखो मुक्त परवानाधारक मीडिया होस्ट करणाऱ्या साइटसाठी लैंगिक आशयासंदर्भात धोरण तयार करण्याचे सध्याचे प्रयत्न सुरू झाले.
mt: In response to community outrage, thousands of free media hosts are working on policies for content related to sexual orientation.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: केलेले काम बहुतांशी सैद्धांतिक होते, परंतु हा कार्यक्रम सॅजिटेरियस गॅलॅक्सीमध्ये केलेल्या निरीक्षणांचे अनुकरण करण्यासाठी हा कार्यक्रम लिहिण्यात आला होता.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made in the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: आकाश गंगेतील गडद पदार्थ आणि दीर्घिका यांच्यातील गडद पदार्थ यांच्यामधील भरतीच्या बलांनी केलेल्या परिणामांचा अभ्यासाकडे समूह लक्ष ठेवून होता
mt: A study of the effects of the gravitational forces between the dark matter and the filaments of the dark matter in the sky is being studied by the group
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: ज्याप्रमाणे चंद्र आणि पृथ्वीमधील गुरुत्वाकर्षणामुळे समुद्राला भरती येते त्याचप्रमाणे आकाशगंगा आणि धनु आकाशगंगा यादरम्यान गुरुत्वाकर्षण असते.
mt: As the Moon and Earth are attracted to each other by gravity, so are the Milky Way and the Sagittarius Dwarf Galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: शास्त्रज्ञ हे प्रतिपादन करण्यात यशस्वी ठरले की गडद पदार्थ इतर गडद पदार्थांना तसेच परिणाम करतात जसे की सामान्य पदार्थ करतात.
mt: Scientists have successfully demonstrated that heavy elements affect each other as they affect ordinary elements.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: हा सिद्धांत असे सांगतो की आकाशगंगेच्या सभोवतालचे सर्वाधिक गडद पदार्थ हे आकाशगंगाच्या सभोवताली एकप्रकारच्या तेजोमय पोकळीत स्थित आहेत तसेच ते असंख्य लहान कणांपासून बनलेले आहेत.
mt: This theory states that the most dense matter in the universe is in a uniform, highly compressed state surrounding the universe, and is made up of an infinite number of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: दूरदर्शनच्या अहवालांमध्ये झाडांमधून पांढरा धूर येत असल्याचे दाखविले आहे.
mt: The television report showed white smoke coming from the trees.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: स्थानिक अधिकारी हे वनस्पतींच्या सानिध्यात राहणाऱ्या रहिवाशांना घरामध्येच रहा, एअर कंडिशनर बंद करा आणि नळाचे पाणी पिऊ नका असा इशारा देत आहेत.
mt: Local officials are advising residents living near vegetation to stay in their homes, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: जपानच्या अणू एजन्सी नुसार, प्रकल्पामध्ये किरणोत्सारी सिजीयम आणि आयोडीन आढळून आलेले आहे.
mt: Japan's nuclear agency says the project has found radioactive cesium and iodine.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: अधिकारी हे अंदाज बांधत होते की यावरून हे दर्शवते की स्थळावरील युरेनियम इंधन असणाऱ्या टाक्या कदाचित फुटल्या असतील किंवा गळत असतील.
mt: Officials were speculating that the incident may have been caused by a breach or leak of the uranium fuel rods at the site.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: डॉ. टोनी मोल यांनी क्वाझुलु-नताल या दक्षिण आफ्रिकी प्रदेशात अतिशय औषध प्रतिरोधक क्षयरोगाचा (एक्सडीआर-टीबी) शोध लावला.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered a highly drug-resistant form of tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African province of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: "एका मुलाखतीत ते म्हणाले की नवीन प्रकार ""अत्यंत उच्च मृत्यू दरामुळे अत्याधिक त्रासदायक आणि भयावह"" होता."
mt: "In one interview, he said the new type was "extremely high mortality, extremely traumatic and horrific."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: डॉ. मोल यांना वाटते की, काही रुग्णांना हॉस्पिटलमध्ये समस्या आलेली असू शकते आणि त्यामध्ये किमान दोन आरोग्य कर्मचारी होते.
mt: Dr. Mol said he believes some patients may have had problems in the hospital and that at least two health workers were involved.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
